content: this pattern was initially published under the working title squish helmet a simple hat in garter stitch and ribbing knitted bottom-up in the round the garter panels give this hat incredible squish and generous stretch making it one of my most comfortable and versatile hats one size fits most finished hat is 9 in/23 cm tall with circumference about 20 in/51 cm stretches to fit heads up to about 24 in/61 cm any worsted weight yarn may be used some aran and heavier dk weights may also be suitable only one needle size is used the ribbing uses a twisted stitch for tightness instead of a smaller needle size this hat is beginner-friendly a quick knit and a simple one-skein project
